description: This file defines the ToDoItemStore class, which manages a collection of ToDoItem objects, including loading from and saving to local storage, adding, updating, and removing items, and dispatching change events.

classes.name: todomvc.model.ToDoItemStore
classes.description: A class that manages a collection of ToDoItem objects, with persistence and event dispatching.

classes.name: todomvc.model.ToDoItemStore.ChangeEvent
classes.description: Event class dispatched when the ToDoItemStore changes.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the list of ToDoItems from local storage.

methods.name: addOrUpdate
methods.description: Adds a new ToDoItem or updates an existing one based on ID.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a specified ToDoItem from the store.

methods.name: notify_
methods.description: Dispatches a change event and optionally saves the current state.

methods.name: save_
methods.description: Serializes and saves the current list of ToDoItems to local storage.
